data.comment: The match is underway at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Free kick Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 2, Pohang Steelers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Pohang Steelers at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Ball safe as Pohang Steelers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Jeonbuk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half?
In the minute 9, Free kick for Jeonbuk in the half of Pohang Steelers.
Pohang Steelers needs to be cautious. Jeonbuk have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 17, Goal kick for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Pohang Steelers are coming forward and Kang Sang-woo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 20, Jeonbuk have a goal kick.
Jeonbuk drive upfield and Modou Barrow gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Pohang Steelers defender.
Throw-in Jeonbuk.
In the minute 23, Jong Hyeok Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
Takahiro Kunimoto (Jeonbuk) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 25, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a throw-in for Jeonbuk, close to Pohang Steelers's area.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 29, Jong Hyeok Kim awards Jeonbuk a goal kick.
In Jeonju Jeonbuk attack through Takahiro Kunimoto. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Pohang Steelers goal kick.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
Takahiro Kunimoto (Jeonbuk) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Jeonju.
In the minute 35, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Pohang Steelers throw-in in Jeonbuk's half.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Pohang Steelers goal kick.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Jeonbuk close to the penalty box.
Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 41, Hong Jeong-ho (Jeonbuk) has received a first yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Jeonju.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
In the minute 43, In Jeonju Jeonbuk drive forward through Takahiro Kunimoto. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in the half of Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Can Pohang Steelers capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Jeonbuk's half?
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Jeonbuk to take a throw-in in Pohang Steelers territory.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Pohang Steelers are pushing forward but Aleksandar Palocevic's finish is wide of the goal.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Jeonbuk a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Pohang Steelers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Modou Barrow of Jeonbuk smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Jeonbuk throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half.
In the minute 50, Throw-in Jeonbuk.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Jeonju.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Jeonbuk in the half of Pohang Steelers.
Gustavo (Jeonbuk) has hit the post with a header.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
In the minute 56, Lee Ju-yong of Jeonbuk gets in a strike, but is off target.
Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Pohang Steelers to take a throw-in in Jeonbuk territory.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers just outside Jeonbuk's area.
Pohang Steelers make their first substitution with Lee Kwang-hyeok replacing Manuel Palacios.
In the minute 60, Goal! Pohang Steelers have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Song Min-kyu.
Aleksandar Palocevic instrumental with a fine assist.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Pohang Steelers at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Jeonbuk awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jeonbuk attack but Gustavo's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 63, Ball goes out of play for a Pohang Steelers goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
In the minute 65, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Kwon Wan-kyu is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Jeonbuk.
In the minute 67, Park Jae-woo (Pohang Steelers) has replaced the possibly injured Kwon Wan-kyu at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Lee Seung-ki is replacing Jo Gue-sung for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 73, Jeonbuk push upfield but Jong Hyeok Kim quickly pulls them for offside.
Can Pohang Steelers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Jeonbuk's half?
Lee Dong-gook is replacing Modou Barrow for the home team.
In the minute 74, Ball safe as Pohang Steelers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gustavo of Jeonbuk gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Jong Hyeok Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
In Jeonju a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Lee Dong-gook for Jeonbuk drives towards goal at Jeonju World Cup Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 79, At Jeonju World Cup Stadium, Jeonbuk are penalized for being offside.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in the half of Jeonbuk.
Song Min-kyu's header is off-target for Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 80, Goal kick for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Pohang Steelers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 82, Jeonbuk have a dangerous throw-in.
Jeonbuk's Lee Ju-yong gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Pohang Steelers goal kick.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kang Hyeon-mu (Pohang Steelers) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 86, Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
Shin Hyung-min is on a sub for Kim Bo-kyung for Jeonbuk.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
Pohang Steelers drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Throw-in high up the field for Jeonbuk in Jeonju.
Jeonbuk to take a throw-in in Pohang Steelers territory.
Jeonbuk have a dangerous throw-in.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Jeonbuk throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half.
Pohang Steelers needs to be cautious. Jeonbuk have an attacking throw-in.
Can Jeonbuk capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
The match has come to a close in Jeonju. The final score is 0-1.
The away team replace Aleksandar Palocevic with Shim Dong-un.
Pohang Steelers's Aleksandar Palocevic has been booked in Jeonju.
